channel.title: To Do List on Electronic Lab Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in To Do List on Electronic Lab Notebook

item.title: Setting up some to-do lists
item.author: your@email.com (Your Name)
item.description: We are going to host our final notebook on GitHub, so having access to to-do lists is a nice benefit. Here’s an example: Solar System Exploration, 1950s – 1960s [ ] Mercury [x] Venus [x] Earth (Orbit/Moon) [x] Mars [ ] Jupiter [ ] Saturn [ ] Uranus [ ] Neptune [ ] Comet Haley … and the Markdown that creates this: ### Solar System Exploration, 1950s – 1960s - [ ] Mercury - [x] Venus - [x] Earth (Orbit/Moon) - [x] Mars - [ ] Jupiter - [ ] Saturn - [ ] Uranus - [ ] Neptune - [ ] Comet Haley So we can create to-do lists for specific days/projects/assignments etc.
